website_summaries.verdict: A good wasp spray from a well-known brand that gets rid of wasps quickly.
pros: Sprays a long distance and kills wasps on contact
Easy to use and gets rid of wasps quickly
cons: May not eradicate pests if the spray doesn't touch them directly

customer_reviews.title: Wasp Killer WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I keep a can of this spray on my back deck and spray wasps with it. I do not spray them if they are on the chair, table, toys, or anything we may be touching soon. It kills bugs, it's toxic, it smells, but It Works. My local store was out otherwise I would not buy it online, it's much cheaper to purchase in store ( dollar general, walmart, target) make sure it's Wasp Hornet Killer,the " flying insect" spray is really just for flys
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F90

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. i'd buy it a the local grocery store or Walmart. much cheaper, less than $5 a can.
customer_reviews.author: Family F

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Brand with Dependable Results
customer_reviews.text: Raid Wasp & Hornet Spray is quite effective with dependable results. I have a life-threatening allergy to those stings, so important to have strong, reliable spray to minimize their making nests around my home. I periodically lightly spray the eaves and exterior window corners to prevent nests getting started, rather than waiting so fewer dead insects. Works the same with mud-daubers too. The Review System asked for ratings on Thickness and on Warmth -- have no idea how those apply to wasp spray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knocks them dead, highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand of wasp and hornet spray for many years, it has the highest consecrations of what kills the wasp immediately . Plus when it says that it sprays 20 feet , that is accurate and it sprays at where you point it. I will keep using it as long as they keep making it.
customer_reviews.author: RdHogg

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: Of course, it works great for standing back and aiming at swarming insects, huge spiders, etc., and I carry a can in the car by the driver's seat .... have a few around the house for protection. Seriously. Not to get into the gun debate, but I have one .... not in every room though. So ... I have a few of these on hand also. I read once that this is a good self defense item to keep around - works better than pepper spray.
customer_reviews.author: SRF

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Product For Bee Control
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Raid product for years for dealing with the bees. The best product because it works. It will spray over 20 feet keeping you a safe distance from being subject to a bee sting.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Its good. Its great for the quick kill
customer_reviews.text: Its great, it has some spray distance and its good for the quick kill but i recommend getting the foaming product as well to really get into the holes or nests to kill the hive. SO with that said i buy this and the foam. used together they are a perfect match to get rid of you bee / wasp problem within 2-3 days!
customer_reviews.author: MJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comes out in a strong, powerful stream of product and works well.
customer_reviews.text: The spray comes out strong and powerful. Easy to open, easy to use. It has a good long stream of product. The problem is, when I went out to use it, what I thought was wasps when looking in my security cameras ended up being bees, and I don't want to kill those.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective
customer_reviews.text: This has the longest spray distance of all the brands I have used. Who wants to be close to those little fellers. It will also knock them down mid flight when they're chasing after you angrily.
customer_reviews.author: kompewterz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice to get three cans of this in one package. It's been hard to find this summer.
customer_reviews.author: TLG

customer_reviews.title: The Only Wasp Killer To Use
customer_reviews.text: Raid is the only wasp killer to get. The others just don't do the job Raid does. I'm allergic to bees and wasps so I definitely need a killer that will work.
customer_reviews.author: James Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Good spray
customer_reviews.text: Has a decent spray range but the can finishes quickly. It does kill and keep the carpenter and wasps away temporarily . Downfall is the can finished so quickly and that you have to get another to for long term control over the bees and wasps
customer_reviews.author: DRADR

customer_reviews.title: Just spray it on!
customer_reviews.text: It shoots so far and it works really well! All you have to do is go to the nest at dusk then get about five feet away, then spray!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. It does the job! Great Product! I Diffinatly will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: We had a huge hornets nest. We used another product which deformed the nest but didn't get rid of the hornets. They rebuilt the nest. We used Raid and got rid of them. I could stand a distance away and make a direct hit. Should have used it the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Tagg

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a large yellow-jacket nest next to my home. One application and no more nest. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: JIM C

customer_reviews.title: Makes a mess but kills/stuns on contact
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for destroying the nest. Just be sure to have a hose ready to wash the residue away - this thing makes a mess but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work at all. wasps are still around and they liked it!
customer_reviews.author: SHUANG LIANG

customer_reviews.title: Can kill a wasp if it hits it.
customer_reviews.text: This is non-foaming so unless you hit the wasp directly it doesn't do much. Order foaming kind from Amazon instead.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin T Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Long spray keeps you away from the wasps as you are killing them!
customer_reviews.author: Christer Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: I've sprayed these wasps, both red and black ones ...
customer_reviews.text: I've sprayed these wasps, both red and black ones, 3 even 4 times directly on and they just come back with vengeance! I bout 12 cans, gone in a week. Wasps still dominate.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Jae

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These really do work well, I used one can to take care of a reasonable sized nest during the early evening & the next day after I had soaked the nest the previous evening, the whole nest was dead.
customer_reviews.author: Lance S.

customer_reviews.title: 1 shot, 1 kill
customer_reviews.text: Got the wasp square in the face and it was toast in less than a second. What else can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: JSC

customer_reviews.title: Love these bottles
customer_reviews.text: Love these bottles! I was able to stand at a safe distance and spray the Pests. Has an immediate affect which keeps them from flying at you.
customer_reviews.author: VinnieC

customer_reviews.title: and I am quite happy with the product purchase
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped reasonably quickly, and I am quite happy with the product purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. J. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Easy to aim and spray. Wasps did not return.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need for those nasty wasps. works good
customer_reviews.author: #1Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Third time worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: It killed them dead... And when they came the second time did so also... Third time worked like a charm... There was no fourth time...
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: great but the can will be empty after not too many uses..
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job but it seems even after using it for a few nest one can is almost empty..
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Shaw

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff Ive used so far
customer_reviews.text: Kill wasps and hornets within 5 seconds of contact. The best stuff Ive used so far.
customer_reviews.author: luscious214214

customer_reviews.title: Great wasp killer
customer_reviews.text: Best wasp killer I have found. Knocks them down quick.
customer_reviews.author: anita waters

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I used this while trying to kill wasps and it shoots only about 3 feet! It did not perform as promised!
customer_reviews.author: S. Denise

customer_reviews.title: 2/3 had no pressure
customer_reviews.text: Two out of three cans had no pressure and I had to throw them away, looks like the CO2 died out in it or something.
customer_reviews.author: Zangief

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wasp spray
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this specific spray for years and it has been difficult finding it locally because it is always sold out. I'm really glad I found it online. This stuff drops wasps, hornets, bees, etc. pretty much instantly on contact. I always keep a couple of cans on hand.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peifer

customer_reviews.title: Ot Works
customer_reviews.text: Not only good for Hornets but for self safety. I care a can in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: wasp spray so needed just used our last
customer_reviews.text: this wasp spray great has steady stream that kills wasps on contact love it
customer_reviews.author: philip diane spinolo

product_meta.title: Raid Wasp and Hornet Spray- 17.5 ounces - 3 Pack
product_meta.description: Raid. Wasp and hornet killer allows to attack from a distance by dispatching the entire nest along with hornets, mud daubers, wasps, yellow jackets and can be used for outdoors only. Raid Wasp and hornet killer can be sprayed in early morning/evening when the insect activity is minimal and until nest is thoroughly saturated. Insect killer comes in a container of 17.5 oz and is electrically non-conducting up to 32,500 volts.
feature_bullets: Raid Wasp and Hornet Spray- 17.5 ounces - 3 Pack

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
